S/N Before After Insert/Delete Remarks Submitted By Submitted Date {{i+1}} {{holiday.holidayDate | date: 'dd-MM-yyyy'}} - {{holiday.holidayDate | date: 'dd-MM-yyyy'}} - Insert Delete {{holiday.remarks}} {{holiday.statusBy}} {{holiday.statusDt | date: 'dd/MM/yyyy' }}
import {HttpErrorResponse, HttpResponse} from '@angular/common/http'; import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {IPublicHoliday} from 'app/administration/black-out-date/public-holiday/public-holiday.model'; import {CustomToastService} from 'app/layouts/service/customtoast.service'; import { NspConfirmationService } from 'app/shared/confirm/nsp-confirm.service'; import {ConfirmationService} from 'primeng/api'; import {PublicHolidayApprovalService} from './public-holiday-approval.service'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-public-holiday-approval', templateUrl: './public-holiday-approval.component.html', styleUrls: ['./public-holiday-approval.component.scss'] }) export class PublicHolidayApprovalComponent implements OnInit { pendingHolidays: IPublicHoliday[] = []; selectedHolidays: IPublicHoliday[] = []; constructor( private publicHolidayApprovalService: PublicHolidayApprovalService, private nspConfirmService: NspConfirmationService, private toastService: CustomToastService ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.retrievePendingApprovals(); } retrievePendingApprovals(): void { this.publicHolidayApprovalService.getCurrentPending().subscribe( (res: HttpResponse) => { this.pendingHolidays = res.body; }, (error: HttpErrorResponse) => { console.log(error.message); } ); } exportCSV(): void { console.log("Export CSV clicked"); } confirm(event: Event, key: string, choice: number): void { this.nspConfirmService.onConfirmPopup(event, key, null, () => { console.log("confirm") this.submitRequest(choice); }); } submitRequest(choice: number): void { console.log(this.selectedHolidays); if (choice === 1) { this.publicHolidayApprovalService.approve(this.selectedHolidays).subscribe( (res: HttpResponse) => { if (res.ok) { this.toastService.add({ severity: 'success', summary: 'Success', detail: "Request has been approved" }); this.refresh(); } }, (error: HttpErrorResponse) => { console.log(error.message); this.toastService.add({ severity: 'error', summary: 'Error', detail: "Request error" }); } ); } else if (choice === 0) { this.publicHolidayApprovalService.reject(this.selectedHolidays).subscribe( (res: HttpResponse) => { if (res.ok) { this.toastService.add({ severity: 'success', summary: 'Success', detail: "Request has been reject" }); this.refresh(); } }, (error: HttpErrorResponse) => { console.log(error.message); this.toastService.add({ severity: 'error', summary: 'Error', detail: "Request error" }); } ); } } refresh(): void { this.pendingHolidays = []; this.selectedHolidays = []; this.ngOnInit(); } }
